name: BearTable
template:
{{environment.component.name}} {{ctrl.message}}
{{header.title}} -

ctrl:{{header.control}}
{{header.title}}
Value:{{oneRecord[ header.name+'_select' ]}}
List:{{ctrl.getWSelectListOptionsItem(header)}}
{{ctrl.getWSelectDisplayFromListItem(header, oneRecord[ header.name+'_select' ])}}
Value:{{oneRecord[ header.name+'_select' ]}}
List:{{ctrl.getWSelectListOptionsItem(header)}}
{{item.display}}
{{oneRecord[ header.name ] }}
dis:{{ctrl.getActionReadOnly(header, oneRecord);}}
{{oneRecord}}
{{ctrl.getErrorMessage()}}
Debug Content:{{ctrl.getContent()}}
Records per pages
description:
Display a table, with rich control. Via the header, different mechanism can be controlled:
* sort the column, yes or no
* filter the column, yes or no
* type of the control for the record : input, text, select, link, button
